properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tunakuja na vipaji vyetu mbele zako ee Bwana
Tunatoa shukrani zetu kwako Baba muumba x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tunaleta mavuno, Bwana Mungu pokea
Tunaleta na fedha, Bwana Mungu pokea
Mkate na divai twakuomba upokee x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nimatunda ya mashamba yetu uliyotujalia
Ndilo jasho letu sisi Bwana twakuomba pokea x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Watumishi wako tunakuja na zawadi kidogo
Twakusihi sana Mungu Baba pokea mikononi x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nafsi zetu zote mali yako utupokee sisi
Ee Bwana tujalie afya uzima na baraka x2
